dataList.content: ... Whoever... art thou?
Hm.

dataList.title: The Index Proxy
dataList.content: I was bidden to introduce myself a Proxy of the Index, the one who will guide you to an abode of your dwelling.

dataList.title: The Index Proxy
dataList.content: Or perhaps you could call me "Yi Sang" should that be to your preference.

dataList.title: The Index Proxy
dataList.content: Hermes—hm, I meant to say—the Prescript. By the Prescript's own implication, extrapolated from its wording... a Second Kindred you must be.
"Second... Kindred?" Whatever art thou referring to? And... my fellow Fixers here have warned me that I mustn't leave the confines of this—

dataList.title: The Index Proxy
dataList.content: Hm... there is little cause for you to be so fixated on these so-called Fixers and the things they utter.
A-and why is that?

dataList.title: The Index Proxy
dataList.content: Because they do not have the answers.

dataList.title: The Index Proxy
dataList.content: I, on the other hand... can give you the only answers—only the answers.
H-how is such a thing possible?

dataList.title: The Index Proxy
dataList.content: Hm... you endeavored to lull even the beckoning aroma of blood to silence. Thus, were I to speak upon a plane within your grasp...

dataList.title: The Index Proxy
dataList.content: You might wish to think it this way: it is thanks to this device—the Great Magicked Beeper.

dataList.title: The Index Proxy
dataList.content: Here... do you see it? Its beeps and bleeps carry along certain words to be displayed...
Ooh... Ooooh!!

dataList.title: The Index Apprentice
dataList.content: R-Rocinante... V-verily, I deem this not the right path...

dataList.title: The Index Apprentice
dataList.content: I w-wish to set forth anon and fulfill the task of which m-my master hath laid upon me...

dataList.title: The Index Apprentice
dataList.content: And yet, the G-Great Magicked Beeper is still...

dataList.title: The Index Apprentice
dataList.content: Ah!

dataList.title: The Index Apprentice
dataList.content: Th-this is it!

dataList.title: The Index Apprentice
dataList.content: Nngh... Master, the c-ciphers, verily, they appear too intricate...

dataList.title: The Index Apprentice
dataList.content: Should I, by mischance, let them slip from my memory, would I then be lost to this place forevermore?

dataList.title: The Index Nursefather
dataList.content: Be at ease, for naught here calls for your concern.

dataList.title: The Index Nursefather
dataList.content: Once you have carried out the Prescript, the Great Magicked Beeper will lead you back home.

dataList.title: The Index Nursefather
dataList.content: You need only gallop on to where the Prescript points, astride the saddle of Rocinante the faithful.

dataList.title: The Index Apprentice
dataList.content: Pray... w-wouldst thou open this door for me?

dataList.title: The Index Apprentice
dataList.content: 'Tis locked, forbidding my passage.

dataList.title: The Index Apprentice
dataList.content: Nngh... 'tis a grievous hindrance indeed. I would f-fain step within...

dataList.title: The Index Apprentice
dataList.content: Hark, Rocinante. To c-cast all caution aside and ch-charge forth with reckless abandon... 'tis a thing most unwise.

dataList.title: The Index Apprentice
dataList.content: I... I am not well-versed in the s-speechcraft of persuasion, but...

dataList.title: The Index Apprentice
dataList.content: A-ahem.

dataList.title: The Index Apprentice
dataList.content: Um... I am a-already aware of thy presence within.

dataList.title: The Index Apprentice
dataList.content: P-perchance these lifeless bodies have struck fear into thee...?

dataList.title: The Index Apprentice
dataList.content: F-fear not, friend. Thou needst not q-quake so. These were but unkind s-souls—most unkind.

dataList.title: The Index Apprentice
dataList.content: A-as I observed upon my way hither... I did notice th-the researchers here to be... uhm, kind. Aye, they were kind, forsooth, each and all of them.

dataList.title: The Index Apprentice
dataList.content: Verily, I am q-quite fond of those who are kind! I p-pray thee, open the door. I sh-shall do thee no harm...

dataList.title: The Index Nursefather
dataList.content: Has aught gone awry? You look as though you are sunken beneath a heavy gloom.

dataList.title: The Index Nursefather
dataList.content: It mirrors the memory of your disappointment a few months ago when you told me that the just and heroic Fixers inked in pages failed to take flesh among those you met.

dataList.title: The Index Apprentice
dataList.content: W-well...

dataList.title: The Index Apprentice
dataList.content: Th-the other compatriots of m-mine at the House of Spiders...

dataList.title: The Index Apprentice
dataList.content: Th-they lend not their ears unto m-my voice... All they do is bully me.

dataList.title: The Index Apprentice
dataList.content: They are always vexed by my s-stammering tongue, and c-cut me off even though I h-haven't finished speaking...

dataList.title: The Index Nursefather
dataList.content: Don't let yourself be saddened overmuch.

dataList.title: The Index Nursefather
dataList.content: They are all... fierce of character, with a singular disposition.

dataList.title: The Index Apprentice
dataList.content: I meant only... to c-converse with them awhile.

dataList.title: The Index Apprentice
dataList.content: Would they b-but speak as kindly as thou dost, my kind master...

dataList.title: The Index Apprentice
dataList.content: I... I cannot understand w-why they are so eager to wound m-me with their sharp words.

dataList.title: The Index Apprentice
dataList.content: Wh-wherefore... Wherefore dost thou not answer me?

dataList.title: The Index Apprentice
dataList.content: ... Th-thou...

dataList.title: The Index Apprentice
dataList.content: So thou hast resolved to... to not open this door.

dataList.title: The Index Apprentice
dataList.content: D-denying it shall profit thee naught.

dataList.title: The Index Apprentice
dataList.content: ... The Great Magicked Beeper h-hath made known to me all thy designs.

dataList.title: The Index Apprentice
dataList.content: Ah... it c-cannot be helped.

dataList.title: The Index Apprentice
dataList.content: Th-there is one I must needs meet.

dataList.title: The Index Apprentice
dataList.content: My m-master would have it so, and I do wish it as well. 'Tis a fate p-preordained by the Great Magicked Beeper.

dataList.title: The Index Apprentice
dataList.content: ... Thus, thou art in the w-wrong... for denying m-me entry.

dataList.title: The Index Apprentice
dataList.content: Decide.

dataList.title: The Index Apprentice
dataList.content: Unlock.

dataList.title: The Index Apprentice
dataList.content: Transcend.

dataList.title: The Index Apprentice
dataList.content: H-hast thou the conviction?

dataList.title: The Index Apprentice
dataList.content: The absolute, unbreakable c-conviction on the definitions of Good and Evil?

dataList.title: The Index Nursefather
dataList.content: Many are those who have come to accept the Prescripts.

dataList.title: The Index Nursefather
dataList.content: Those who gladly wear the blindfold of faith in service of the Prescripts are, indeed, also quite prevalent in the ranks of the Index.

dataList.title: The Index Nursefather
dataList.content: Yet, the efflorescence of your E.G.O signifies a conception of a most unusual perspective within you.

dataList.title: The Index Nursefather
dataList.content: Your conviction lies beyond the mere acceptance of Prescripts, beyond ordinary fatalism.

dataList.title: The Index Nursefather
dataList.content: Only when the infinite verisimilitude of one's own immanent yearning and the Prescript is attained, that the procuration of one is akin to the procuration of the other...

dataList.title: The Index Nursefather
dataList.content: ... does the will of the Prescript become one's own ego.

dataList.title: The Index Apprentice
dataList.content: T-then, hath mine efforts finally begun to shine through?

dataList.title: The Index Nursefather
dataList.content: Nay, that is not entirely correct; for endeavors to shape one's own cerebration are oft exercises in futility.

dataList.title: The Index Nursefather
dataList.content: Hm... An apt explanation would say that such a state is not something that can be consciously striven toward.

dataList.title: The Index Apprentice
dataList.content: Y-yet I have it.
If only blind, obsessive faith were the therapy to one's soul... the lives of City dwellers could have improved, if to a nigh-indiscernible degree.
One cannot blossom an E.G.O merely by believing in or by adhering to the delineation of Good and Evil as defined by the Prescript.
To quote a certain child... it is possible only when the infinite verisimilitude to one's own immanent yearning and the Prescripts are attained.
Like a looping echo...
... the Prescripts and the child's consciousness must interlock with the infinitesimal difference.

dataList.title: LCE
dataList.content: ... These security walls are useless without the emergency defensive systems, huh... She ripped right through it.

dataList.title: LCE
dataList.content: But as long as I have this E.G.O Gear...

dataList.title: The Index Apprentice
dataList.content: Thus spake my Master:

dataList.title: The Index Apprentice
dataList.content: Bring the outfit of the one who walketh the path full of dazzling colors... the path intent on thwarting all attempts to memorize it.

dataList.title: The Index Apprentice
dataList.content: 'Tis by great fortune that I found it in time.

dataList.title: LCE
dataList.content: Attunement level at 70%... With this, I can...
The researcher, who lost all will to fight as soon as he saw the child tear through the security wall, raised his Attunement level with the E.G.O.
He must've been rather optimistic about his chance of survival and escape, especially with an E.G.O extracted from the wayward child.
However...

dataList.title: The Index Apprentice
dataList.content: 30 seconds.

dataList.title: LCE
dataList.content: Gah...!
The distorted and pulverized vibrations of the City contain more than just the present.
In the flutterings of anticipation lies the future... and in the reverberations of regret the past.
Thus, in between the myriad vibrations...
... are faint frequencies that have escaped the laws of causality, captured then by a god of the City and written into Prescripts in which causes and effects are enmeshed in disarray.
It has-It might-It may have actualized-actualize-actualized...
The echoes of fate.

dataList.title: The Index Apprentice
dataList.content: "K-kill all the doors of the c-ceiling."

dataList.title: The Index Apprentice
dataList.content: Thou hast fled a-above mine head.
Effloresced E.G.O::Procuration.
That E.G.O, which is a proxy of ■■■, a god of the City, is quite similar to a Distortion.
A concept, perceived as "Prescripts", ■—
<color=#dc3531>Oh. This isn't yet…</color>
Effloresced E.G.O::Procuration.
Just as it was the case with the Nursefather of the Index, whom the child follows as her "Master..."
... it is interesting, how even the E.G.O that bloomed from her own heart is but an... imitation of something else.

dataList.title: The Index Apprentice
dataList.content: There are no attachments or s-sentimentalities when M-master kills.

dataList.title: The Index Apprentice
dataList.content: P-prithee, I beg thy understanding that there is no ill-will to my killing of th-thee just the s-same.

dataList.title: The Index Apprentice
dataList.content: M-much b-blood hath been spilled on my cloak.
His head smashed to unrecognizable mulch, the researcher slumps to the floor.
The child takes the E.G.O gear off the dead researcher for herself before looking around helplessly.
She has come across a fork in the road: a choice must be made.

dataList.title: The Index Apprentice
dataList.content: U-uhm. To sally forth, or to r-retreat...

dataList.title: The Index Apprentice
dataList.content: I would much prefer to s-sally forth, yet...

dataList.title: The Index Apprentice
dataList.content: Th-The Great Magicked Beeper hath spoken! I am to sally forth!

dataList.title: The Index Apprentice
dataList.content: Hee hee. H-hast thou borne witness to it, O Rocinante?

dataList.title: The Index Apprentice
dataList.content: Once again, the Will of the P-Prescript did align with mine own.
